edge_1: Mirage secretly offers Bob a mission to subdue a giant robot on Nomanisan island.
edge_2: Mirage is working for Syndrome, now calling himself 'Syndrome' after being embittered by Bob's rejection.
edge_3: Syndrome has become wealthy by inventing weapons that mimic superpowers.
